snippet: New York State’s consolation round of bidding for a casino license in the thinly populated Southern Tier, the impoverished region bordering Pennsylvania, got off to a lackluster start on Monday.
abstract: New York State's invitation to submit proposals for casino license in state's impoverished Southern Tier, area bordering Pennsylvania, attracts only one bidder; developer Jeffrey Gural submits proposal for $195 million casino complex.
lead_paragraph: New York State’s consolation round of bidding for a casino license in the thinly populated Southern Tier, the impoverished region bordering Pennsylvania, got off to a lackluster start on Monday.

headline.main: Gambling Board Gets a Single Casino Proposal After Reopening Bidding
headline.print_headline: One Proposal in New Round of Bidding for a Casino
